author: AnnaMaria Andriotis
title: CtW Recommends Equifax Shareholders Vote Against 3 Directors
text:
An adviser to union pension funds that are invested in Equifax Inc. is calling on the credit-reporting company’s shareholders to vote against re-election of three board members, including the chairman, saying the company wasn’t prepared to fend off a massive cyberattack last year.
CtW Investment Group, in a letter that will be sent to shareholders on Wednesday, says nonexecutive Chairman Mark Feidler and longtime board members John McKinley and Mark Templeton failed to act on repeated warnings of cybersecurity issues at Equifax...
